headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
If you need help blending in, all Import/Export Hoodies are 50% off.

Upwardly mobile strivers can take 40% off the cost of the Casino Penthouse, plus High-End Apartments and their Renovations and 60% off Executive Offices. Plus, there's discounts on vehicles:

- Karin Kuruma (Armored) - 40% off
- Imponte Ruiner 2000 - 35% off
- Pegassi Reaper - 40% off
- Vapid FMJ - 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
